All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CrossEntropy
A class for computing cross entropy loss
Dataset<Tin,Tout>
Abstract class for all Dataset classes.
GradientChecker
GradientChecker class.
Layer
An interface for all layers.
Linear
A class for linear layers (Y = XW + b)
Loss
An interface for all loss functions.
MeanSquaredError
A class for computing mean squared error loss
MNISTClassifier
 
MNISTDataset
 
Optimizer
An interface of optimizers (e.g.
Pair<Tx,Ty>
 
ReLU
A class for ReLU layers (rectified linear unit) y = x if x > 0 else 0.
Sequential
A sequential container, containing a sequence of layers.
SGD
SGD (stochastic gradient descent) class
Sigmoid
A class for sigmoid layers y = 1 / (1 + exp(-x)).
Softmax
A class for softmax layers y[i] = exp(x[i]) / sum_j exp(x[j]).
Tanh
A class for sigmoid layers y = 1 / (1 + exp(-x)).
WeightInit
An interface for weight initialization.
WeightInitNorm
Generate a weight matrix from a normal distribution N(mean, std).
WeightInitUniform
Generate a weight matrix from a uniform distribution U(minVal, maxVal)
WeightInitXavier
Generate a weight matrix using Xavier's method ( see paper, equation 16).
